This page describes the contents of the RStudio project folder that can be downloaded by students from a link on this page. This project folder is called the "workbook" and contains a folder with data files and an exercises folder that contains a subfolder where students can save completed work.


[Download the student workbook](workbook/R-course-NEON-workbook.zip)

You can also just download a zipped folder containing all of the exercises:

[Download the exercise files](workbook/exercises.zip)
